text: Dar Yasin is an Indian photo-journaist. He has been awarded Pulitzer Prize for his extensive cover on the Kashmir conflict. ==Early life & education== Dar was born in 1973 at kashmir, India. Studied computer science and technology baccalaureate from South India. ==Works== Dar has extensively covered the conflict on Kashmir conflict, the Earthquake in South Asia and its aftermath, and the landmark opening of the bus route between divided Kashmir. He is now working at Associated Press. ==References== ==Other websites== * The 2020 Pulitzer Prize Winner in Feature Photography Category:Indian journalists Category:Pulitzer Prize winners
title: Dar Yasin
